name: market for venting of argon, crude, liquid | venting of argon, crude, liquid | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2461/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'venting of argon, crude, liquid', in the Global geography.;No transport required.;venting of argon, crude, liquid' describes venting of gaseous argon (CAS 007440-37-1) into the atmosphere as an emission to air as argon-40. Argon is produced mainly as a by-product in air separation, cryogenic activity, where oxygen, liquid is produced as a reference product.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'venting of argon, crude, liquid',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  venting of argon, crude, liquid', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
